radiographic_examinations.findings: Incidentally noted is a right pleural effusion. The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. A 2.5 x 1.5 cm rounded isoechoic mass along the inferior aspect of the right hepatic lobe. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. No ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation.

Interval progression of elevated transplant kidney resistive indices; little if any diastolic flow identified in the transplant kidney with resistive indices approaching 1. Main renal artery peak systolic velocity increasing, at 191 cm/s. No hydronephrosis.
